headline: Client Computing Global Outlook Report 2025-2028 Featuring Apple, Lenovo, HP, ASUSTek, and LG Electronics
summary: The 2023 Global Client Computing Market Report offers insights into market size and growth, analyzing trends, drivers, and challenges up to 2028. headline: Earnings Preview: What to Expect From HP's Report
summary: HP is expected to release its fiscal third-quarter earnings later next month, and analysts project a low double-digit profit drop.
